name: Eyes Not Burning
description:
A Chess.Com Live Chess Arena V2 Theme for you
Bigger clocks, fonts and profile picture, darker backgrounds, new chessboard... Your texts are green, friends' blue.
additional_info:
Sugessted theme(http://www.chess.com/home/themes) as a base:
1. Chess.com Standard Theme
2. Blue

You can can copy one of these to My Themes, and put a background image of your choice.
